1_17LQPJZz9sBC1besM5ZwKFKt9CmndJTjcA.body:
"Let us use all our force to replace the circulation of gold by that of paper: our banks will absorb the gold, and we shall decide then what value the paper money will have, this will make us the masters of every man's existence"
The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion  (1903)
https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/The_Protocols_of_the_Learned_Elders_of_Zion

and the Jews took our gold, gave us paper and they became the masters of our existence
